headline: Cognizant and Uniphore Partner to Deliver Smarter, Domain-Specific AI for the Enterprise
summary: Cognizant announced a strategic partnership with Uniphore focused on the joint development of industry-specific AI solutions that combine small language models, AI agents and deep industry expertise. The collaboration aims to help enterprises deploy targeted, governable AI capabilities aligned to real business workflows and designed to help enterprises turn AI into a durable part of how their businesses run.

content.title: Cognizant and Uniphore Partner to Deliver Smarter, Domain-Specific AI for the Enterprise

headline: Adobe And Cognizant Target Enterprise AI Content Workflows And Investor Concerns
summary: Adobe and Cognizant expanded their collaboration to help large enterprises adopt generative AI for content creation and customer experience. The partnership focuses on embedding AI into creative workflows while supporting governance, compliance, and efficiency needs. The effort targets regulated and high growth industries that are facing fast rising content and personalization demands. Adobe, ticker NasdaqGS:ADBE, is leaning into generative AI at a time when its share price sits at $293.25...
